typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_pre_dim_claim_team as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		emp_id_main_adjuster as decimal(28,10),
		tem_description as string,
		sign_lcacrsign as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		tem_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select *  from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_claim_team',
	format: 'query') ~> MPreDimClaimTeam
MPreDimClaimTeam alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		tem_key as string,
		tem_description as string,
		tem_id as long,
		top_id as long,
		top_key as string,
		top_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_pre_dim_claim_team'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tem_key,
		tem_description,
		tem_id = pk_pre_dim_claim_team
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimClaimTeam
